definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: drive, drive asunder ( NH id., spread, be diffused, disseminated (of odour); Ar. nadafa strike, beat, esp. bow-string with mallet, to clean cotton; also play the lyre; Aram. [[נְדַף]] = NH; Eth. nadafa: throw, hurl);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. sf. [[יִדְּפֶנּוּ]] Job 32:13 (juss.); 3 fs. sf. [[תִּדְּפֶנּוּ]] Ps 1:4; 2 ms. [[תִּנְדּׂף]] Ps 68:3; —drive about, chaff, subj. wind Ps 1:4; wicked, subj. God Ps 68:3 ([[כְּהִנְדּׂף עָשָׁן]], v. infr.); cf. Job 32:13 (= defeat, anguish).

definitions.title: Niph
definitions.body: . Pf. [[נִדַּף]] Is 19:7; Inf.. [[כְּהִנְדּׂף]] Ps 68:3 (v. Kö:i. 306 f); Pt. [[נִדָּף]] Le 26:36 + 3 t.;—be driven, driven about (esp. by wind) Ps 68:3, v. supr. (like a driving [Che drift] of smoke); of breath ([[הֶבֶל]]) fig. of deceitful gain Pr 21:6 (LXX Hi Ew [[רׂדֵף]]; v. De Now); of withered plant Is 19:7 (where subj. [[עָרוֹת]], [[מִוְרָע]] i.e. place; whence Che trans. ´[[נ]] vanish; but ref. prob. to plant-life in these places, v. Di); of leaf Le 26:36 (as making slight sound), Job 13:25 (fig. of sufferer, ‖[[קַשׁ יׇבֵשׁ]]), of chaff ([[קַשׁ]]) Is 41:2 (sim. of bow of hostile kings ‖[[עָפָר]]).
